Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to providing recourse for a property owner whose sidewalk is damaged by a tree under the exclusive care of the city of New York.
Items.MatterName: Recourse for an owner, sidewalk damaged by tree.

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the Metropolitan Transportation Authority to relieve overcrowding at the First Avenue subway station of the L train by constructing a second subway entrance at Avenue A and 14th Street to permit access to the eastern end of the platform.
Items.MatterName: MTA, 2nd Subway Entrance at Ave. A & 14th Street

Items.Title: Resolution pursuant to Section 19-511.1 of the Administrative Code of the City of New York to review eleven determinations by the Taxi and Limousine Commission to approve applications for the renewal of a license to operate a base station and one determination to approve an application for a new license to operate a base station.
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
